The year 481 (13 March 1032â€“12 March 1033)

Now at the beginning of this year 481 of the caledar of this Armenian era, there was a severe famine in all the land, and many people were dying in the face of the famine. And many sold their wives and their sons for want of bread. and from the harshness of the afflictions the spirit left the body while speaking, and in this manner the land was spoiled by the famine.
